intro: Eliminate the out of control robots.
description:
SF3RA is an Action platformer, mix of 3D and retro 2D graphics.

SFERA is an intergalactic association of assassins, operating under the cover of the robot union. You are an assassin hired by them. You are tasked to eliminate out of control robots in the A7FA-3T system.

Destroy enemies, collect items and buy new weapons. Your drone assistant can attack enemies if you upgrade it.

Explore unusual planets and the space base of A7FA-3T system with secret rooms. 

The transition between planets is made on an intergalactic ship. You need to fly through the stars smashing asteroids and collecting elements.


Features:
* Classic 2D pixel platformer with 3D gameplay
* Beautiful backgrounds with parallax effect
* Five different areas with hidden rooms
* Five different bosses
* The game provides a full map overview of each level
* Vibrant pixel graphics
* Original music
